tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Very difficult teacher I would say, I received a C- after trying and trying to get it up. Her exams are very long and each problem is worth almost 10 points so unless you get it perfect she doesn\'t give you a lot of credit. She also isn\'t very good about helping you if you don\'t know something. She thinks you should just know as much as she does.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Ms. Thimm is my favorite professor at Ambrose. I hated math until I was in her class. She really explains the material and helps learn it. She also offers help if you need extra. She provides good study guides and her exams aren\'t horrible. She is a great teacher and person and I would recommend her to all. She also tells really funny jokes haha.
